pageTitle: There is a problem with the service pages – Get an air pollution assessment – GOV.UK Design System
heading: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
bodyText: The service may not have saved your data. When the service is available, you may have to start again.
contactIntro: If you have any questions, please contact the '{{serviceName}}' service team.
openingTimes: Monday to Friday: 8.30am to 4pm (except statutory holidays)
responseTime: We aim to respond within 2 working days
